attributes.additional_details: we want the goverment to stop the murder of innocent dogs that havent hurt anyone or done anything wrong just because of their breed. we want you to release juke he is currently in custody for simply defending him self when attact by 2 other dogs we have 20 days to save his life before he is put down every day dogs are put done when the shouldnt be we might tighter laws on when its ok to put a dog down and stop the slaughter of innocent dogs
